name: Griffon

topics.topic_text: DLC03AudioHolotapesWQ02GriffonExplains
topics.response_text: This is Griffon recording. All you clowns listen up. I'm leaving you in charge of the bottling operation while I'm away doing my thing at Underworld.

topics.topic_text: I might like a bottle of Aqua Cura. How much are you selling them for?
topics.response_text: Well friend, how much would you be willing to pay? For such an AMAZING product as the Amazing Aqua Cura?{enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch}

topics.topic_text: I've seen your bottling operation. The jig is up.
topics.response_text: My what now? My bottling operation? Oh you mean where I add my secret ingredient to the Aqua Pura.{worried his con is discovered}

topics.topic_text: That's NOT Aqua Pura. If you want my silence, you'll have to buy it.
topics.response_text: Why you... I ought to... <Grumble>{angry}

topics.topic_text: We split the profits 50/50 or this will end badly for you.
topics.response_text: Fine. 50/50 it is. But only of the profits. I still have to recoup my initial investment. You come back once a week, and I'll give you your share.{annoyed he has to share}

topics.topic_text: Fine, 20/80 in your favor. But if you stiff me, you'll regret it.
topics.response_text: Fine. 20/80 it is. But only of the profits. I still have to recoup my initial investment. You come back once a week, and I'll give you your share.{annoyed he has to share}

topics.topic_text: Forget all that. Just give me 300 caps this once, and we'll call it even.
topics.response_text: Hmm. That's pretty steep...{considering if he's being ripped off}

topics.topic_text: Either you tell them, or I tell them. Your call.
topics.response_text: I can't believe it... I have a good thing going here... Why mess that up for me? What have I done to you?{shocked and annoyed}

topics.topic_text: Look. I won't expose your lies... but only if you start selling real Aqua Pura.
topics.response_text: That's seriously going to cut into my profits... but perhaps you're right.{annoyed but resigned}

topics.topic_text: Is that any different from regular Aqua Pura?
topics.response_text: Why? Have you heard otherwise?{suddenly worried his scam is found out}

topics.topic_text: No. I mean, you just changed the name? Or did you do something to it?
topics.response_text: I changed the name to help Ghouls realize its amazing properties. And, well, just between us...{confidentially, snakeoil salesman confiding in an allyEmphasis on "amazing"}

topics.topic_text: You can get Aqua Pura for free. Why pay for yours?
topics.response_text: The Brotherhood doesn't deliver to Underworld, you know. There's shipping expenses and all that. Not to mention sneaking past Super Mutants.{defensively explaining}

topics.topic_text: You got a nice head of hair. For a Ghoul, I mean.
topics.response_text: Aha! That's right my good fellow. The Amazing Aqua Cura will rescue, restore, and regrow your hair back from premature balding.{enthusiastic, snake-oil sales pitch}

topics.topic_text: Tell you what. I'll trade you a piece of blue sky for a bottle.
topics.response_text: Ha ha ha.{nervous laughter}

topics.topic_text: Got a free sample I could try?
topics.response_text: A FREE sample you say? Hmm... Well... I normally don't do this... but, for YOU, for this ONE TIME ONLY, a VERY special VIP promotional offer...{snake oil salesmen}

topics.topic_text: How much are you selling them for?
topics.response_text: Well friend, how much would you be willing to pay? For such an AMAZING product as the Amazing Aqua Cura?{enthusiastic snake oil sales pitch}

topics.topic_text: I don't know, 40 caps?
topics.response_text: No, sir. Try again. Lower!{extremely enthusiastic, asking to guess the LOW LOW price!}

topics.topic_text: Do I really have to guess?
topics.response_text: Why yes! You can't imagine how low the special introductory price is. Go on, just guess. You'll never believe it!

topics.topic_text: I'm done playing your guessing game.
topics.response_text: Fine. You're blocking all the real customers anyway. Go on. Get out of here.{annoyed}

topics.topic_text: Well, if I had 10 caps, I might buy a bottle.
topics.response_text: Oh. I didn't realize you were so poor. Well, tough break kid. Maybe you can find someone who can spot you the caps?{disappointed}

topics.topic_text: I think I'll pass. Thanks anyway.
topics.response_text: Oh really? I'm sure you'll change your mind after you discover how AMAZING the product really is! Stick around, I give regular demonstrations.{trying to keep a potential customer, snake oil salesmen}

topics.topic_text: Look, I'm not really interested in buying your Aqua Cura.
topics.response_text: Wh-ell, w-hell, well... if you aren't here to buy the Amazing Aqua Cura, what are you here for?{blustering exaggerated shock}

topics.topic_text: I don't quite have 10 caps.
topics.response_text: Well then I presume you won't mind if I focus on the customers who actually brought money with them? Have a nice day, and good luck finding a job.{not going to waste his time}

topics.topic_text: Sure. Here's 10 caps. Give me a bottle of the "Amazing" Aqua Cura.
topics.response_text: Right you are! Pleasure doing business with you, sir. Come again!{extremely enthusiastic snake oils salesmen}

topics.topic_text: Pip-Boy analysis shows that your Aqua Cura is irradiated. Interesting...
topics.response_text: Uhhhh... What? That doohickey on your wrist says the water's irradiated? That's a pretty fancy device if it can know something like that...{nervous his scam is uncovered}

topics.topic_text: You're clearly up to something. There's no denying it. Talk. Now!
topics.response_text: Oh alright, alright. But if you start blabbing, I've got some buddies with itching trigger fingers...{annoyed his scam was found out}

topics.topic_text: There's nothing wrong with my Pip-Boy. You sir, are a liar.
topics.response_text: Ha! I'd like to see you try and prove that...{arrogantly daring then cutting himself shortemphasis on "prove"}

topics.topic_text: Relax. I don't care. Take these morons for all their worth. I'm just curious.
topics.response_text: It's true, I got a thing going.{leveling with a fellow criminal}

topics.topic_text: Care to tell me where this water operation of yours is located?
topics.response_text: No, not really.{nervous and upset he's being questioned}

topics.topic_text: I'm curious. Where'd you get all this Aqua Pura?
topics.response_text: Really, what's it matter to you anyway?{nervous his scam might be found out}

topics.topic_text: I'm not interested in making trouble. I'm just curious where you got the water.
topics.response_text: Alright. But keep your mouth shut about it...{explaining a secret}

topics.topic_text: I'd have thought giving Aqua Pura to a Ghoul would seem like a waste.
topics.response_text: Huh. I hadn't pegged you as a bigot. My mistake.{offended}

topics.topic_text: Just making conversation. I really don't care where you got the stuff.
topics.response_text: Oh. Sorry. I guess I'm just a little sensitive about the question. Some people think giving Aqua Pura to Ghouls is a waste, afterall.{apologizing}

topics.topic_text: Who does your hair? It looks rather similar to mine, doesn't it?
topics.response_text: Aheh. Um... yeah, look at that. We practically have the same hair cut. What are the chances of that? Aheh.{extremely nervous}

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: I don't have your money yet. Once a week, remember?{somewhat surprised}

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Oh I'm sorry! I'm fresh out of free samples. Try again tomorrow!{lying, snakeoil sales man}

description:
Griffon is a 156 year-old Ghoul Male.

A charismatic but morally bankrupt ghoul entrepreneur who operates out of Underworld. Griffon travels in a large, covered wagon with a flashy banner, selling his fraudulent 'Aqua Cura' to ghouls while secretly trading in real Aqua Pura with less savory elements of the wasteland. Despite his ghoul appearance, he maintains an unnaturally healthy look thanks to a wig found in the Museum Authority stock room.

Griffon's Personality: Cunning, manipulative, and opportunistic with a flair for dramatic salesmanship. Griffon is charming when it serves his purposes but has no qualms about exploiting the desperate hopes of others for personal gain. He views the post-war world as a marketplace ripe for exploitation.

Griffon's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Griffon was a traveling salesman who specialized in questionable health products. When the bombs fell in 2077, he was exposed to significant radiation but managed to survive as a ghoul. Initially struggling with his new condition, he eventually adapted to the wasteland and discovered that his pre-war sales skills were even more valuable in the chaotic new world. Griffon eventually made his way to Underworld, where he established his base of operations while maintaining connections with various unsavory elements throughout the Capitol Wasteland.
